stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="405" x2="414" y1="56.6406" y2="47.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="72" x2="405" y1="56.6406" y2="56.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="381" x2="390" y1="123.6406" y2="114.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="96" x2="381" y1="123.6406" y2="123.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="381" x2="381" y1="123.6406" y2="334.6406"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="62" x="208.5" y="141.1738">«Docker»</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="219" x="130" y="158.7832">Docker Container - Web Server</text><!--cluster 14--><polygon fill="#FFFFFF" points="137,190.6406,147,180.6406,350,180.6406,350,300.6406,340,310.6406,137,310.6406,137,190.6406" style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="340" x2="349" y1="190.6406" y2="181.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="137" x2="340" y1="190.6406" y2="190.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="340" x2="340" y1="190.6406" y2="310.6406"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="137" x="171" y="208.1738">«Apache Tomcat 8.x»</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="106" x="186.5" y="225.7832">Apache Tomcat</text><!--entity 15--><rect fill="#DDDDDD" height="55.2188" style="stroke: #707070; stroke-width: 1.5;" width="155" x="165.5" y="239.6406"/><text fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="78" x="204" y="264.1738">«Container»</text><text fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="135" x="175.5" y="281.7832">Runtime Environment</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="499" x="0" y="399.1738">An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.</text><!--
@startuml(id=DeploymentView)
scale max 2000x1409
title CSIS - Deployment - Development
caption An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.

skinparam {
  shadowing false
  arrowColor #707070
  actorBorderColor #707070
  componentBorderColor #707070
  rectangleBorderColor #707070
  noteBackgroundColor #ffffff
  noteBorderColor #707070
  rectangleFontColor #ffffff
  rectangleStereotypeFontColor #ffffff
}
node "Developer Laptop" <<Microsoft Windows 10 or Apple macOS>> as 12 {
  node "Docker Container - Web Server" <<Docker>> as 13 {
    node "Apache Tomcat" <<Apache Tomcat 8.x>> as 14 {
      rectangle "Runtime Environment" <<Container>> as 15 #dddddd
    }
  }
}
@enduml

PlantUML version 1.2018.13(Mon Nov 26 18:11:51 CET 2018)
(GPL source distribution)
Java Runtime: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment
JVM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM
Java Version: 1.8.0_172-b11
Operating System: Windows 10
OS Version: 10.0
Default Encoding: UTF-8
Language: de
Country: DE
--></g></svg>

deploymentViews.description: An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.
